price: 87. Waxaana u waxyoonnay Muuse iyo walaalki (Haaruun, Annagoo leh) Uga yeela qolodiinna20 guryo ay degaan Masar gudaheeda, oo ka dhiga guryihiinna goobo cibaado (isu dhow, oo u furan booqashada) oogana salaadda oo u bishaaree mu’miniinta.
arabic: وَأَوۡحَيۡنَآ إِلَىٰ مُوسَىٰ وَأَخِيهِ أَن تَبَوَّءَا لِقَوۡمِكُمَا بِمِصۡرَ بُيُوتٗا وَٱجۡعَلُواْ بُيُوتَكُمۡ قِبۡلَةٗ وَأَقِيمُواْ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَۗ وَبَشِّرِ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ
footnotes: 20. Si ay ugu tukadaan halkaa iyagoo uusan arkayn cadowgooda iyo si ay deris u ahaadaan iska warqaba oo isa soo booqda.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wa-awḥaynā ilā mūsā wa-akhīhi an tabawwaā liqawmikumā bimiṣ'ra buyūtan wa-ij'ʿalū buyūtakum qib'latan wa-aqīmū al-ṣalata wabashiri al-mu'minīna
